title: The Glory of Their Times: The Story of the Early Days of Baseball Told by the Men Who Played It
description: From the Preface:This new enlarged edition of The Glory of Their Times contains the complete text and all the photographs that were in the original book, published in 1966, plus for the first time the first-person stories of four additional major-league players - George Gibson, Babe Herman, Specs Toporcer, and Hall of Famer Hank Greenberg.
author: Lawrence S. Ritter
